roleset.name: put pen to paper

example.name: all args
example.text: Jayark, New York, distributes and rents audio-visual equipment and prints promotional ads for retailers.

example.name: with medium
example.text: John printed his dissertation on fifteen rolls of toilet paper.
example.arg: on fifteen rolls of toilet paper

roleset.note: Frames file for 'print' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 25.2. No Framenet entry. Comparison with write.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Hahaha phat farm , I m a also cop them fly screen printed scarface shirts with the matching British knights

roleset.name: print, generally on a computer printer

example.name: args 0,1
example.text: If the banks could randomly print out the number of each note withdrawn according to the monetary value , will anything go wrong any more ? Will any person take this advantage any more ?
example.arg: the number of each note withdrawn

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7.
